parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per protocol-specified study treatment, collected-dosing interval, per subject, per mood

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.STUDYID

datasetVariables.description: Unique identifier for a study.
datasetVariables.label: Study Identifier
datasetVariables.name: STUDYID

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.DOMAIN

datasetVariables.description: Two-character abbreviation for the domain.
datasetVariables.label: Domain Abbreviation
datasetVariables.name: DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: ECSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECGRPID

datasetVariables.description: Used to tie together a block of related records in a single domain for a subject.
datasetVariables.label: Group ID
datasetVariables.name: ECGRPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECREFID

datasetVariables.description: Internal or external identifier (e.g., kit number, bottle label, vial identifier).
datasetVariables.label: Reference ID
datasetVariables.name: ECREFID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECSPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. Perhaps pre-printed on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or defined in the sponsor's operational database. Example: Line number on a CRF Page.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: ECSPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECLNKID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to link related records across domains.
datasetVariables.label: Link ID
datasetVariables.name: ECLNKID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECLNKGRP

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to link related, grouped records across domains.
datasetVariables.label: Link Group ID
datasetVariables.name: ECLNKGRP

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECTRT

datasetVariables.description: Name of the intervention treatment known to the subject and/or administrator.
datasetVariables.label: Name of Treatment
datasetVariables.name: ECTRT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C125923

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECMOOD

datasetVariables.description: Mode or condition of the record specifying whether the intervention (activity) is intended to happen or has happened. Values align with BRIDG pillars (e.g., scheduled context, performed context) and HL7 activity moods (e.g., intent, event). Examples: "SCHEDULED", "PERFORMED".
datasetVariables.label: Mood
datasetVariables.name: ECMOOD

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECCAT

datasetVariables.description: Used to define a category of related ECTRT values.
datasetVariables.label: Category of Treatment
datasetVariables.name: ECCAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECSCAT

datasetVariables.description: A further categorization of ECCAT values.
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory of Treatment
datasetVariables.name: ECSCAT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECPRESP

datasetVariables.description: Used when a specific intervention is pre-specified. Values should be "Y" or null.
datasetVariables.label: Pre-Specified
datasetVariables.name: ECPRESP

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECOCCUR

datasetVariables.description: Used to indicate whether a treatment occurred when information about the occurrence is solicited. ECOCCUR = "N" when a treatment was not taken, not given, or missed.
datasetVariables.label: Occurrence
datasetVariables.name: ECOCCUR

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECDOSE

datasetVariables.description: Amount of ECTRT when numeric. Not populated when ECDOSTXT is populated.
datasetVariables.label: Dose
datasetVariables.name: ECDOSE

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECDOSTXT

datasetVariables.description: Amount of ECTRT when non-numeric. Dosing amounts or a range of dosing information collected in text form. Example: "200-400". Not populated when ECDOSE is populated.
datasetVariables.label: Dose Description
datasetVariables.name: ECDOSTXT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71620

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECDOSU

datasetVariables.description: Units for ECDOSE, ECDOSTOT, or ECDOSTXT.
datasetVariables.label: Dose Units
datasetVariables.name: ECDOSU

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECDOSFRM

datasetVariables.description: Dose form for ECTRT. Examples: "TABLET", "LOTION".
datasetVariables.label: Dose Form
datasetVariables.name: ECDOSFRM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C71113

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECDOSFRQ

datasetVariables.description: Usually expressed as the number of repeated administrations of ECDOSE within a specific time period. Examples: "Q2H", "QD", "BID".

datasetVariables.name: ECDOSFRQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

datasetVariables.description: Total daily dose of ECTRT using the units in ECDOSU. Used when dosing is collected as Total Daily Dose.

datasetVariables.name: ECDOSTOT

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECDOSRGM

datasetVariables.description: Text description of the intended schedule or regimen for the Intervention. Example: "TWO WEEKS ON", "TWO WEEKS OFF".
datasetVariables.label: Intended Dose Regimen
datasetVariables.name: ECDOSRGM

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66729

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECROUTE

datasetVariables.description: Route of administration for the intervention. Examples: "ORAL", "INTRAVENOUS".
datasetVariables.label: Route of Administration
datasetVariables.name: ECROUTE

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECLOT

datasetVariables.description: Lot Number of the ECTRT product.

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for anatomical location further detailing laterality of the intervention administration. Examples: "LEFT", "RIGHT".

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for anatomical location further detailing directionality. Examples: "ANTERIOR", "LOWER", "PROXIMAL", "UPPER".
datasetVariables.label: Directionality
datasetVariables.name: ECDIR

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECPORTOT

datasetVariables.description: Qualifier for anatomical location further detailing distribution, which means arrangement of, apportioning of. Examples: "ENTIRE", "SINGLE", "SEGMENT".
datasetVariables.label: Portion or Totality
datasetVariables.name: ECPORTOT

codelist.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C66742

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECFAST

datasetVariables.description: Indicator used to identify fasting status. Examples: "Y", "N".

datasetVariables.name: ECADJ

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.EPOCH

datasetVariables.description: Trial Epoch of the exposure as collected record. Examples: "RUN-IN", "TREATMENT".

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECSTDTC

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECENDTC

datasetVariables.description: The date/time when administration of the treatment indicated by ECTRT and ECDOSE ended. For administrations considered given at a point in time (e.g., oral tablet, pre-filled syringe injection), where only an administration date/time is collected, ECSTDTC should be copied to ECENDTC as the standard representation.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of Treatment
datasetVariables.name: ECENDTC

datasetVariables.description: Collected duration of administration. Used only if collected on the CRF and not derived from start and end date/times.

datasetVariables.name: ECDUR

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable EC.ECTPT

datasetVariables.description: Text Description of time when administration should occur. This may be represented as an elapsed time relative to a fixed reference point, such as time of last dose. See ECTPTNUM and ECTPTREF.

datasetVariables.name: ECTPT

datasetVariables.name: ECELTM

datasetVariables.name: ECTPTREF

description: An interventions domain that contains information about protocol-specified study treatment administrations, as collected. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C117466, 2018-06-29)
label: Exposure as Collected
name: EC
